member.name: P:JokeGenerator.Questions.Instructions
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Instructions ------------ Press c to get a list of categories. Press r to get list of random jokes. Press q to quit.
Press ? fo get these instructions again. .

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Category <category> is not valid. Please choose from the following list:.
